snippet: The Mets got another solid outing from R. A. Dickey and had 13 singles among their 16 hits in a victory over the Marlins.
abstract: New York Mets beat the Miami Marlins, 9-3, in MLB action.
lead_paragraph: The Mets got another solid outing from R. A. Dickey and had 13 singles among their 16 hits in a victory over the Marlins.

headline.seo: Base Hits Add Up as Mets Prevail
headline.main: With a Hit Here, and Another There, the Mets Defeat the Marlins
headline.print_headline: Mets Stick to Winning Formula, Hitting From All Angles
